de.hunsicker.jalopy.storage

Class Loggers

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hunsicker.jalopy.storage.Loggers

  • public final class Loggers
extends Object
    Exposes the loggers that are used throughout the system.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.3 $
    Author:
    Marco Hunsicker
